wpt.name: GC1GFT8
wpt.desc: NY Giants by NeedAlternatives, Traditional Cache (1/2.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: NY Giants
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: This cache is located in Shadyside Park, in West Bradford. You can use the path, which is longer, or cut straight across. Thanks for finding my first cache!
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description: In 2008, the NY Giants pulled off an amazing Super Bowl victory. Not only did they have a LONG UPHILL battle, but the UNDER dogs really STICKed it to the Pats in an unbelievable victory. Just when the Pats thought they were out of the WOODS, the G-menâ€™s quarterback finished an 83-yard drive with a 13-yard touchdown pass to seal the deal. Sorry Eagles fans, but I am a Giants fan in Philly!!

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Quick find while taking the kids to a favorite park.
